item.title: CUDA
item.description: CUDA # Hello World for CUDA # // This is the REAL "hello world" for CUDA! // It takes the string "Hello ", prints it, then passes it to CUDA // with an array of offsets. Then the offsets are added in parallel // to produce the string "World!" // By Ingemar Ragnemalm 2010 // nvcc hello-world.cu -L /usr/local/cuda/lib -lcudart -o hello-world #include <stdio.h> const int N = 16; const int blocksize = 16; __global__ void hello(char *a, int *b) { a[threadIdx.
